Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Malibu in 1981...
Had first career hit on 5/17/1984, off Lawrence Harrison (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/19/1984, off Timo Soto (NJ)...
Traded from Malibu to Toledo on 7/22/1984 (Going to Mal: CF A. Cruz. Going to TOL: CF S. Bosley)...
Injured on 5/9/1985 with a Fractured Cheekbone, out for 6 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Columbus on 9/9/1985...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1988, hitting .379 with 4 HR, 17 RBI...
Injured on 4/14/1989 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 7/25/1989...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/14/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Diablo on 5/29/1991...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 9/3/1991...
